Name: FLATLAND Vol.1
About the game: FLATLAND - Vol. 1 is a fast-paced hardcore platformer featuring hand-crafted levels and Lightning-fast respawns. Help Square survive his journey to the depths of Flatland, a minimalist neon-style 2D world. Run, jump, die, learn, repeat. Key features: Controls are simple and accessible but with several layers of depth to master Ramping up in difficulty from not-so-easy to soul crushing, FLATLAND - Vol 1 features hand-crafted levels with increasing challenges and secrets to uncover. Lightning-fast respawns keep you in the flow even in more difficult levels Challenging, fast and fun gameplay.
